mapper.select: SELECT c.id as id, content, time, updated_time, article_id, c.username as username FROM comment as c LEFT JOIN comment_vote as v ON c.id = v.comment_id WHERE article_id=#{article_id} and id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment(content, time, updated_time, article_id, username) VALUES (#{content}, now(), now(), #{article_id}, #{username})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM comment_vote WHERE id=#{id} and username=#{username}
mapper.select: SELECT count(comment_id) from comment_vote where comment_id=#{id}
